---
title: "Simulering af Data"
author: "Mads"
date: "06/02/2020"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
sim_data_normal = rnorm(n = 2000, mean = 0, sd = 1)
hist(sim_data_normal)
```

```{r}
sim_data_unif = runif(n = 1000, min = 0, max = 10)
hist(sim_data_unif)
```

```{r}
sim_data_binom = rbinom(n = 1000, size = 20, prob = 0.5)
hist(sim_data_binom)
```
